value:
I have been told the teas in Askr
could stand toe to toe with Fódlan's
finest. I will have to test them.

Amidst war, tea parties are necessary
intervals of calm. They give us time to
reflect on our reasons for fighting.

As your server, I would be more than
happy to bring the snacks— Hang on.
Some appear to be missing...

If you need anything, please tell me.
As your server, all I wish is for you to
come away satisfied.

I made these teas myself. Each is of
the highest quality, as you can tell by
their aromas.

I am Ferdinand von Aegir! I brought
something to accompany your tea,
courtesy of $Nf.

An exceptional tea party! One of my
best, I daresay.
Small sips.
Oh dear... I may have oversteeped it.

Your kindness is noted, though I
would happily perform my duties
without any recognition.

I am Ferdinand von Aegir! As your
new server, I will personally see that
you are fully fed and refreshed!

Welcome to the tea party! By all
means, have a sip. Do you like it?
Delicious, no?$k$pThere are those who would look
askance at us for sitting down for a
tea party during wartime...$k$pBut you and I know that times of
great conflict are when such things
are most vital.$k$pFor nothing facilitates a discussion
about hopes and ideals quite like
a good, fragrant pot of tea.$k$pOne cannot begin to envision a
bright future without room to relax
and stretch one's mind.$k$pI firmly believe that—and I think it
holds true for everyone, of noble
birth and otherwise.$k$pSo no, I don't see tea parties as a
waste of time at all. Indeed, I think
their benefits are quite profound.
Welcome to the party.
Comfortable?
Lovely aroma, no?
No need to thank me.
Save...the tea...
Thank you for choosing me to be your server today. You have excellent taste.
Oh! *chuckle* Careful! I almost spilled your tea!
This is one of my favorite teas. *sniff* Do you smell that fragrance? A delight for the senses!
The tastiest teas are the most fragrant ones. Ah! You may want to make a note of that!
A pleasant conversation is the perfect complement to a nice cup of tea.
We seem to be running out of cakes surprisingly quickly. Hmm...
Please, have a seat! I've brewed something particularly special with you in mind.
Ready to serve.
Next up?
While it's hot.
